data.title: Sigourney Weaver tests out the flamethrower prior to filming Alien (1979) on the Shepperton Studios' backlot lawn in 1978 in this...
data.meta_description:
17 likes, 0 comments - thescreenmash on April 30, 2024: "Sigourney Weaver tests out the flamethrower prior to filming Alien (1979) on the Shepperton Studios' backlot lawn in 1978 in this behind-the-scenes production image. A remote switch was used to activate the lighter inside, and once lit, director Ridley Scott "liked to keep it that way."

Interestingly, while the flamethrower makes a notable appearance in the climax of the film, with Ripley carefully making her way through the Nostromo (the ship) with it, she never actually uses it on the Alien. She instead chose to get away in the shuttle and destroy the ship. Still cool!

(Sources: Xenopedia Fandom Wiki, r/movies Subreddit)
